headline: Salesforce Q2 results could 'shore up' investor confidence on AI
summary: On Autodesk's (ADSK) earnings call last week, CEO Andrew Anagnost notably said, "AI may eat software, but it's not gonna eat Autodesk." This comment came after software stocks rallied while Salesforce (CRM) is scheduled to report its quarterly results tomorrow, Wednesday, September 3. Macquarie Head of US Technology Research Steve Koenig speaks with Julie Hyman about investing opportunities in the software industry as it relates to artificial intelligence and what to expect from Salesforce earnings. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
